QuestData.Title: What Horrible Presents!
QuestData.Description: That mean old Grumpus has amassed a collection of odd gifts. He's deliberately trying to crush the spirit of children everywhere by giving out the worst presents imaginable.$B$BTake this spirit bomb. Toss it on some of Grumpus's unusual gifts and take them out for good!$B$BWe're in this together, $n. Now go and save the spirit of the holiday!
